channel.title: Crash to desktop on player death
channel.description: I'm noticing a crash to desktop issue on player death during Surface Tension, and the Gonarch boss fight, no not responding errors, just instantly crashed to desktop instead of the map reloading to last checkpoint, I mentioned this to a friend and they think there's a stack misappropriation on such maps.

item.title: Crash to desktop on player death
item.dc:creator: Itauske
item.description:
Public beta no other mods installed,
Processor AMD Ryzen 7 3700x 8 core processor
64gb of ram
Windows 10 Pro
GeForce GTX 1060
MSI X570 ACE motherboard

Read full topic

item.description:
I’m noticing a crash to desktop issue on player death during Surface Tension, and the Gonarch boss fight, no not responding errors, just instantly crashed to desktop instead of the map reloading to last checkpoint, I mentioned this to a friend and they think there’s a stack misappropriation on such maps.
